utterances.transcript_with_note: [Scene: Monica's Restaurant, continued from earlier.]

utterances.transcript: What uh-What did you-What?!

utterances.transcript: I still love you. And I know I probably shouldn't even be here telling you this, I mean you're with Chandler a guy I really like, and if you say he's straight I'll believe you! After seeing ya the other night I knew if I didn't tell ya I'd regret it for the rest of my life. Letting you go was the stupidest thing I ever did.

I mean a pig can have like a hundred sexual partners in a lifetime, and that's just an ordinary pig not even a pig that's good at sports!

utterances.transcript: Y'know, let's face it, I'm not a kid anymore! I-I need to be with someone who-who wants the same things that I do! I mean coming to my place of work and telling me that you love me, I want that! Talking about pig sex over lunch, I don't want that!

utterances.transcript: I think that's fair.
caption: i think that s fair

utterances.transcript: Fair? Please don't even talk to me about fair! Fair would've been you wanting to marry me back then! Or fair would've been Chandler wanting to marry me now! Believe me, nothing about this is fair! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing!
caption: fair please don t even talk to me about fair fair would ve been you wanting to marry me then or chandler wanting to marry me now believe me nothing about this is fair nothing nothing nothing

utterances.transcript: It's okay! Shh! Hey. Hey. Shhhh.
utterances.transcript_with_note: It's okay! Shh! Hey. Hey. (Hugs her) Shhhh.
caption: it s okay hey shh

utterances.transcript: Nothing. I don't kn-Umm. I don't know. Umm...
utterances.transcript_with_note: Nothing. (She backs away a little bit but is still in his arms and looks up at his eyes.) I don't kn-Umm. I don't know. Umm...
caption: nothing i don t know

utterances.transcript: I know.
utterances.transcript_with_note: I know. (Backs away.)
caption: i know

utterances.transcript: Y'know, I-I... I have to figure...some st-Y'know, some stuff before I can...
caption: yeah i i i have to figure some stuff before i can

utterances.transcript: Yeah, I understand. Take as much time as you want. Ten, even twenty minutes if you need it. I'll be here. Not smoking.
utterances.transcript_with_note: Yeah, I understand. Take as much time as you want. (Pause) Ten, even twenty minutes if you need it. I'll be here. Not smoking. (Monica leaves.)
caption: yeah i understand take as much time as you want ten 20 minutes if you need it i ll be here not smoking

plots: When Richard said that that seems fair , Monica says that none of it is fair —
Monica struggles with not being in a relationship with Richard any longer .
Monica tells Richard that a grown woman needs a grown man , Monica then tells Richard she needs some time to think things over and leaves .
fair would have been if Richard had wanted to marry Monica back when they were together , or if Chandler wanted to marry Monica now .
Monica insults a mask hanging on the wall in Richard 's apartment , and Richards thinks Monica was talking about Richard .
Monica goes to see Richard and says wants to be with a grown - up .

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Scene: Richard's Apartment, time lapse. Richard is smoking as he hears a knock on the door. He quickly puts out his cigar and opens the door.]

utterances.transcript: Chandler.
caption: chandler

utterances.transcript: Where is she? I'm not scared of you!
utterances.transcript_with_note: Where is she? I'm not scared of you! (Averts his eyes and walks in.)
caption: where is she i m not scared of you

utterances.transcript: She's not here and please come in.
caption: she s not here and please come in

utterances.transcript: Scotch on the rocks, with a twist, on a coaster? Ha-ha, Monica! Monica!
utterances.transcript_with_note: (examining the coffee table) Scotch on the rocks, with a twist, on a coaster? Ha-ha, Monica! Monica!
caption: scotch on the rocks with a twist on a coaster monica monica

utterances.transcript: Okay, she was here, but she left.
caption: okay she was here but she left

utterances.transcript: Well where did she go?
caption: where did she go

utterances.transcript: Well she said she had to think things over.
caption: she said she had to think things over

utterances.transcript: Oh my God, I can't believe this! Y'know, I thought...I thought you were a good guy.
caption: oh my god i can t believe this i thought you were a good guy

utterances.transcript: Oh, hey look nothing happened.
caption: oh hey look nothing happened

utterances.transcript: Nothing happened? Nothing? So you didn't tell my girlfriend that you love her?
caption: nothing happened nothing you didn t tell her you love her

utterances.transcript: Well all right, one thing happened?
caption: well all right one thing happened

utterances.transcript: Y'know what? I can't believe this! Do you know what you did? My girlfriend is out there thinking things over! You made my girlfriend think!!
caption: you know what you did my girlfriend is thinking things over you made my girlfriend think

utterances.transcript: Well I'm sorry.
caption: well i m sorry

utterances.transcript: And what does she have to think about? I love her!
caption: what s to think about i love her

utterances.transcript: Well, apparently I'm willing to offer her things that you are not.
caption: well apparently i m willing to offer her things that you are not

utterances.transcript: But I am willing to offer her all those things. This was just a plan, y'know? A way to throw her off course so that when I offered her all these things, she'd be surprised!
caption: i m willing to offer her those things this was just a plan to throw her off so when i offered all these things she d be surprised

utterances.transcript: Well if it helps, it worked very well.

utterances.transcript: It was working until you showed up, you big tree! I mean, this isn't fair. You had your chance with her! You had your chance and you blew it! And this is my chance and I am not going to blow it because we are meant for each other! And this is all just been one stupid mistake! I was gonna propose tonight.
utterances.transcript_with_note: It was working until you showed up, you big tree! I mean, this isn't fair. You had your chance with her! You had your chance and you blew it! And this is my chance and I am not going to blow it because we are meant for each other! And this is all just been one stupid mistake! (Sits down heavily.) I was gonna propose tonight.

utterances.transcript_with_note: Yeah I even (pause) got a ring. (Puts in on the center cushion.) Did you get a ring?

utterances.transcript: No I don't have a ring! You go get her Chandler. And can I give you a piece of advice? If you do get her, don't let her go. Trust me.
utterances.transcript_with_note: No I don't have a ring! (Pause) You go get her Chandler. (Pause) And can I give you a piece of advice? If you do get her, don't let her go. Trust me.

utterances.transcript_with_note: (Chandler gets up and runs out, but as soon as the door closes behind him he opens it, runs back in, picks up his ring Richard is holding up for him, and runs back out.)

plots: Monica and Chandler go out to dinner where he plans to propose to her , but at the same restaurant Richard comes in and as dinner at the same place , so Chandler can not propose there .
When Chandler finds out what Richard had said to Monica , Chandler realizes Chandler has to stop messing with Monica and propose as soon as possible .
Chandler goes to see Richard , and tells Richard that Richard blew Richard 's chance , but that Chandler was going to ask Monica to marry Chandler .
Chandler goes to Richard 's apartment to find Monica . Chandler gets mad at Richard for telling Monica Richard loved her .

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Scene: The Hallway, Chandler is running up the stairs and towards his apartment, but Joey is taking out the garbage at the same time and stops him in the hall.]

utterances.transcript: Dude!
caption: dude

utterances.transcript: I can't talk to you now, I gotta find Monica!
caption: i ve gotta find monica

utterances.transcript: She's gone.
caption: she s gone

utterances.transcript: What?
caption: what

utterances.transcript: She's gone. She had a bag and she left.
caption: she had a bag and she left

utterances.transcript: What are you talking about?

utterances.transcript: Well why didn't you stop her?! Why didn't you just tell her it was a plan?!

utterances.transcript: I-I did! I told her everything, Chandler! But she wouldn't believe me.

utterances.transcript: Well where... Where did she go?

utterances.transcript: I can't believe I ruined this.

utterances.transcript: I am so sorry man.

utterances.transcript_with_note: (He walks dejectedly into his apartment to find it lit with about a thousand candles and Monica standing in the living room.)

utterances.transcript: You wanted it to be a surprise.
caption: you wanted it to be a surprise

utterances.transcript_with_note: (He turns to look at Joey who smiles slyly and closes the door leaving them alone.)

utterances.transcript: Oh my God.
caption: oh my god

utterances.transcript_with_note: (Monica gets down on one knee.)

utterances.transcript: Chandler... In all my life... I never thought I would be so lucky. As to...fall in love with my best...my best... There's a reason why girls don't do this!
utterances.transcript_with_note: Chandler... In all my life... I never thought I would be so lucky. (Starting to cry.) As to...fall in love with my best...my best... There's a reason why girls don't do this!
caption: in all my life i never thought i would be so lucky as to fall in love with my best my best there s a reason why girls don t do this

utterances.transcript: Okay! Okay! Okay! Oh God, I thought... Wait a minute, I-I can do this. I thought that it mattered what I said or where I said it. Then I realized the only thing that matters is that you, you make me happier than I ever thought I could be. And if you'll let me, I will spend the rest of my life trying to make you feel the same way. Monica, will you marry me?
utterances.transcript_with_note: Okay! (He joins her on one knee) Okay! Okay! Oh God, I thought... (Starting to cry, pauses) Wait a minute, I-I can do this. (Pause) I thought that it mattered what I said or where I said it. Then I realized the only thing that matters is that you, (Pause) you make me happier than I ever thought I could be. (Starting to cry again.) And if you'll let me, I will spend the rest of my life trying to make you feel the same way. (Pause as he gets out the ring.) Monica, will you marry me?

utterances.transcript: Yes.
